attributes.action: Stand Down As Prime Minister & Leader Of The Labour Party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Replace Gordon Brown with a leader that listens to public opinion and can get this country back on track. The country is out of control and needs a tough new leader that can change things around quickly and address public concerns.

The is no law and order, no respect, petrol and fuel prices are increasing daily and not a peep from Mr Brown or his goverment. 

What happened to a goverment of all the talents? More like a goverment of the talentless!

You were never an elected leader and have already bottled an election. 
So, let the people decide on this petition if you should be leading this country going forward. Maybe then its time to listen?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
